definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: The boss has a nasty habit of baiting defenceless subordinates.
sentences.chinese: 这位老板有一个作弄孤立无助的下级的恶习。

sentences.english: He had meant to advise his subordinates constructively this time.
sentences.chinese: 这次他倒是打算给下级一些建设性的指示的。

sentences.english: Skinner's case will head back to lower courts for argument on the merits.
sentences.chinese: 斯金纳的情况下将头回对下级法院的案情说法。

sentences.english: I know one investment banking boss who penalises underlings for lobbying crassly .
sentences.chinese: 我认识的一位投行老板就会惩罚那些过分游说的下级。

sentences.english: He summoned his subordinates hastily to his office.
sentences.chinese: 他急忙召唤他的下级去他的办公室商议。

sentences.english: Am I sufficiently well-informed to pass judgment on subordinates'proposals?
sentences.chinese: 通过下级的提议时我是否有足够的信息？

sentences.english: Such grumbling has mostly come from junior officials.
sentences.chinese: 这一类抱怨，大多来自下级官员。

sentences.english: The impression that Mr. Potts regarded his colleagues as inferiors made him unpopular.
sentences.chinese: 波茨先生总是把同事当作下级，这点使他不得人心。

sentences.english: Superior courts may review decisions of lower courts.
sentences.chinese: 高级法院可复审下级法院的判决。

sentences.english: The appellate court affirmed the judgement of the lower court.
sentences.chinese: 受理上诉的法院维持下级法院的判决。

sentences.english: What is an ideal relationship with your boss?
sentences.chinese: 怎样才算是一种理想的上下级关系？

sentences.english: Assange was appealing a lower court ruling last February.
sentences.chinese: 去年二月，阿桑齐对下级法院的裁决提起上诉。

sentences.english: The captain ordered his men to discharge the cargo from the ship at Keelung .
sentences.chinese: 船长命令下级在基隆卸下船上的货物。

sentences.english: Command Lines indicate the relationship between the selected unit and its superior and subordinate units.
sentences.chinese: 命令线显示所选单位和其上级与下级单位之间的关系。

sentences.english: Measures should be taken to ensure that the lower organizations can exercise their functions and powers normally.
sentences.chinese: 要保证下级组织能够正常行使他们的职权。

definition: troops under one's command/subordinate/affiliated to a ministry
